    describe('Current user', function() {

        describe('on Drink M2m Drinks Orders table', function() {

            var glideRecord = new GlideRecord('x_402400_drink_m2m_drinks_orders');
            var elements = glideRecord.getElements();

            it('can do something', function() {
                expect(elements.length).toBe(10);
            });

        });

    });

    function canCreate(glideRecord, expected) {
        var result = glideRecord.canCreate();
        expect(result).toBe(expected);
    }

})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
